QuestData.Title: In Tents Channeling
QuestData.Description: The yaungol of Fire Camp Ordo are a dire threat. I need you to head northwest and take out their leader.$B$BUnfortunately, his four subordinates are maintaining a fire barrier that prevents us from getting to him in the adjoining cave.$B$BTake them out and the shield will come down. You'll find them in their tents, channeling.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Ordo Embercaller, Ordo Pyromancer, Ordo Firespeaker, and Ordo Blazecaster.
QuestData.RewardText: <The Ordo lieutenants are dead. The shield is down.>$B$B<Time to take out the Ordo leader!>
